cast.overview: A briefcase with undisclosed contents – sought by Irish terrorists and the Russian mob – makes its way into criminals' hands. An Irish liaison assembles a squad of mercenaries, or 'ronin', and gives them the thorny task of recovering the case.
cast.title: Ronin

details.biography:
Steve Suissa (born 7 December 1970) is a French film director and actor. His 2000 film Taking Wing was entered into the 22nd Moscow International Film Festival where he won the award for Best Director.

Source: Article "Steve Suissa" from Wikipedia in English, licensed under CC-BY-SA 3.0.
details.name: Steve Suissa
